name: NSAccessibilityElementLoading
desc: A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to support loading.

items.name: func accessibilityElement(withToken: NSAccessibilityLoadingToken) -> NSAccessibilityElementProtocol?
items.desc: Loads the target accessibility element with the specified load token.

items.name: func accessibilityRangeInTargetElement(withToken: NSAccessibilityLoadingToken) -> NSRange
items.desc: Returns the range that specifies the area of interest in text-based accessibility elements with the specified load token.

items.name: typealias NSAccessibilityLoadingToken
items.desc: A token type for loading accessibility elements.
